text: A viral Facebook post shared more than 1,100 times purportedly contains a COVID-19 conspiracy theory written by former South Carolina Rep. Trey Gowdy.

text: Former U.S. Rep. Trey Gowdy penned a text suggesting that COVID-19 was part of a conspiracy against U.S. President Donald Trump.

text: Trey Gowdy said, I’m not saying COVID-19 isn’t real.... But pay attention folks, there’s much more going on here than what meets the eye.
Virologist Dr. Rob Oswald wrote a lengthy Facebook post calling COVID-19 a hoax.
